mapper.select: select top (10*(${pagenum}+1)) exm001.id,inputdate,exm001.checkid,proceedingname,exm001.IsDeptApproved,exm001.totalamount from taskdsh,exm001 where taskdsh.systemcode=exm001.checkid and taskdsh.isdeptapproved is null and (paychecksign='1' and feekink='f01') and billtype='03' and taskdsh.[operators]=#{username} and exm001.id not in (select top (${pagenum}*10) exm001.id from exm001,taskdsh where taskdsh.isdeptapproved is null and taskdsh.systemcode=exm001.checkid and taskdsh.[operators]=#{username} and (paychecksign='1' and feekink='f01') and billtype='03' order by exm001.inputdate desc) order by exm001.inputdate desc

select count(*) from (select DISTINCT exm001.checkid from taskdsh,exm001,exm00101 where taskdsh.systemcode=exm001.checkid and exm00101.checkid=exm001.checkid and taskdsh.isdeptapproved is null and (paychecksign='1' and feekink='f01') and billtype='03' and taskdsh.[operators]=#{username}) as a
